title: Git_nginx
content:
Push local files to NGINX using GIT #  objectives #   install git in virtual machine connect local git to VPS push local static site to VPS configure NGINX to host the site  1. #  Following this tutorial, under user hugo, create directives for the storing of files
 mkdir var/www/
install git apt-get install git and add new user to check git push and commit  adduser gitter password same as hugo user.
initiate a git on the system
mkdir site.git && cd site.git git --bare init git update-server-info chown -R www-data.www-data . chmod -R 755 . allow firewall
ufw enable ufw allow ssh ufw allow http ufw status 2. #  From local bash in /Hugo/Sites/blog/public connect to the created git
git remote set-url origin http://gitter@myip.address/site.git git add . git commit -m "commit message" git push returned error message  The requested ULR returned error: 403
on stack overflow it says 403 is a credential error. Git can only be accessed by ssh key. So we need to generate ssh key pair to connect local files to my vps with this tutorial.
重新来 #  1. #  su - gitter mkdir hugoblog.git git --bare init 问题来了，bare git 不能看到文件，所以也不能从这个文件夹host static html files
2. #  go to user gitter  su - gitter
generate ssh key pairs in root directory
mkdir -p ~/.ssh && chmod 0700 ~/.ssh gitter@midofnowhere:~$ touch ~/.ssh/authorized_keys gitter@midofnowhere:~$ chmod 0600 ~/.ssh/authorized_keys gitter@midofnowhere:~$ git init --bare ~/hugoblog.git Initialized empty Git repository in /home/gitter/hugoblog.git/ check local ssh keygen in local git bash  cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub then copy the keygen to vps authorized key file.
go to local git bash
git init git remote set-url origin gitter@myip:hugoblog.git git add . git commit -m "commit message" git push --set-upstream origin main ##no branches in remote git yet so set up a main branch successfully pushed. How to check the files on vps?
Bare git does not allow viewing files directly. It only contains version control. Need to use hook to deploy static html files.

title: Publish Hugo on Github
content:
Publish Hugo on Github #  objectives #   generate hugo site locally push generated site - in /public to github use github page to view the site   set github action to automatically push use git to push to my VPS host on my domain  work #  generate site locally #  To generate the site in hugo, cd in the site root, run hugo, the site will be generated in /public 目录。
problems:
 don’t work if the site folder is in an external disk.  move to a local disk solved the problem.   themes don’t render  stackoverflow qs looks like problem with the base url changed to github page url and run hugo again. solved the problem.    push to github #  in the site public folder, run
init gitgit add .git remote add origin https://github.com/username/repository.gitgit commit -m "commit message"git push origin main## other commandsgit remote -v ## to check remotegit remote set-url origin https://github.com/username/anotherrepository.git ## to change remote gitview on github pages #  In github repo settings, check pages. Set main branch as the page source.
